name: Atlantis: Moonlight Defense
description:
Build by day. Defend by night. Save Atlantis.

(Play in fullscreen for the best experience)

Description
  • Gather resources, build, and fortify to defend against the enemies which arrive every night. Enemies grow stronger each night.
  • Win by surviving five nights of attacks.
  • Lose if all your Town Centers are destroyed.
  • Gather resources using workers.
  • Town Centers are used to create workers and deposit resources.
  • To increase the population limit, build Huts and Town Centers.
  • Barracks produces hand-to-hand combat units: Swordsman, Magic Swordsman, Magic Chariot
  • Archery Range produces ranged combat units: Archer, Catapult, Magic Catapult.
  • Food, Wood, Stone and Gold need to be gathered by workers from mines.
  • Temple provides "magic" resource at a specific rate. Magic is also dropped by enemies when they die.
  • Towers fire at enemies.
Controls
  • Use WASD or Arrow Keys to scroll the map.
  • Click to select a unit. Then click on a map location to move the unit, click on a mine to gather (Worker), or click on an enemy to attack.
  • Click on a build option and click on the map to start building.
  • You can then assign more workers to the same building to speed up.
  • I: Jump to next idle Worker.
  • C: Cancel selection
  • B: Ring Town bell. All workers assemble near the center of the map. Press B again to resume duties.
  • Space: Pause/Unpause game
  • Hold down Shift to select multiple units
  • Drag a rectangle on screen to select units
